CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 6, 1954, pg. 20, reads: "Real Hit at Playhouse - Members of the cast of 'Take a Giant Step' are nearing the final curtain at the Playhouse where they have been a smash hit in the Louis Peterson drama. Playhouse audiences has been generous in their praise of the thespians who have been gallantly going through the grind and monotonous routine of preparing for the opening curtain since Feb. 6, when the play opened. The Courier photographer caught some of the cast preparing to go on stage during the last week of the production which ends Saturday...  Lower photos, left to right, Lorraine Keel, Martha Dobbins and Dorothy Kendrick, who also distinguished themselves in supporting roles, apply make-up prior to answering curtain call... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Cast members of play "Take a Giant Step" Lorraine Keel, Martha Dobbins, and Dorothy Kendrick applying make-up before mirrors in dressing room of Pittsburgh Playhouse
